title: Work permits and employment authorization documents (EAD)
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, employer, work authorization category, expiration
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Work authorization status (valid/expired). Link to immigration authority system (employers and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake work permits. Domain binding verifies immigration authority (USCIS, UKVI, etc.). Employer I-9 verification. Prevents unauthorized employment. H-1B, L-1, EAD documentation. Uses SHA-512 (government ID privacy).
